ComicInfo.Summary:
Harada and his Eggbreakers killed one of his teammates, and Pete Stanchek and his band of renegades want to see them answer for their crimes. But when the time comes, will the hot-headed Flamingo have it in her to commit cold-blooded murder?
To help end Flamingo's nightmares about Torque's death, Pete and the others decide to go after the Eggbreakers responsible for his murder. Determining that the killer was Rock, they prepare to attack. But Harada knows of their plan, and dispatches an Eggbreaker assault team. The result is a fierce battle pitting the Harbinger renegades against the Eggbreakers' finest. Is revenge really worth all the bloodshed?
1st Appearances:
BlastWarp
